#summary Frequently Asked Questions

== Does the adapter support out going connections ==
No.

== What protocol should I use? ==
Typically you are implementing this adapter because you have legacy clients that need to connect and these clients cannot be changed. If you could change them then I would recommend not using this adapter and using a servlet with and XML request/Response) or a JAX-RS or JAX-WS webservice. So the protocol is probably fixed.
